Name: Sunset Shapes
About the game: Sunset Shapes is a puzzle game where you connect broken pieces into a single object to cast a shadow. That shadow will reveal a shape of an object that makes part of a scene displayed in a mural. Travel alongside with a Daisy and a Maggot through several scenarios and discover to where they are headed to. In each level, all pieces fall in the play ground. Then You must move and rotate them, so they fit inside the delimited zone. All levels have different pieces to connect. Walk along the mural and play 50 hand-crafted levels while listening a relaxing piano music.
